attributes.action: Criminalise abortion throughout the UK, protecting the lives of the unborn innocents and encourage mothers who do not want their baby to have the child adopted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Life begins at conception and the taking of a human life is murder, before birth or after.  There are plenty of childless couples who would love to adopt and there is currently a shortage of children who need a loving family. EVERY life deserves a chance of life and love, even if deformed or not expected to last long. The unpleasant post-abortion mental anguish would be alleviated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
